details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.8.2 Tagged PDF - 6.8.2.2 Mark information dictionary - Marked entry
details.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary with a Marked entry in it, whose value shall be true.

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary with a Marked entry in it, whose value shall be true.

error.message: MarkInfo dictionary is not present in the document catalog, or Marked entry is set to false or is not present in the MarkInfo dictionary (MarkInfo = %1, Marked = %2)
